For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-6-1)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.6.1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "f2e80f97f9c0b82e2489e61e725df1e6bdaf16c4dacf5e26b95668787164baff",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.1/rules_python-1.6.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "f2e80f97f9c0b82e2489e61e725df1e6bdaf16c4dacf5e26b95668787164baff",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.1/rules_python-1.6.1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/compare/1.6.0...1.6.1

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-6-0)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.6.0")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "fa7dd2c6b7d63b3585028dd8a90a6cf9db83c33b250959c2ee7b583a6c130e12",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.0/rules_python-1.6.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "fa7dd2c6b7d63b3585028dd8a90a6cf9db83c33b250959c2ee7b583a6c130e12",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.6.0/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.6.0/rules_python-1.6.0.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.5.4")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "13671d304cfe43350302213a60d93a5fc0b763b0a6de17397e3e239253b61b73",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.4/rules_python-1.5.4.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "13671d304cfe43350302213a60d93a5fc0b763b0a6de17397e3e239253b61b73",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.5.4/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.5.4/rules_python-1.5.4.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")
```

## Using Bzlmod

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.6.0-rc0")
```

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
```

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

)
```

* build(deps): bump packaging from 24.2 to 25.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2804

## What's Changed
* docs: add steps for creating release candidates by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2687
* fix(toolchain): no chmod on windows when downloading hermetic toolchain by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2693
* fix: correctly find runfiles root for symlinks by @lpulley in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2665
* feat: add riscv64 linux support by @kxxt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2694
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.2.3 to 2.3.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2698
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.2.3 to 2.3.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2699

* chore: remove old versions of Python 3.8 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2700
* feat: uv lock rule instead of genrule by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2657
* feat(python.toolchain): support file-based default Python version by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2588
* fix(pypi): output only necessary target_platforms by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2710
* refactor(pypi): implement PEP508 compliant marker evaluation by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2692
* fix(docs): CHANGELOG "astral" typo by @lpulley in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2715
* build(deps): bump sphinx-reredirects from 0.1.5 to 0.1.6 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2716

* chore: remove semantics.bzl by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2725
* chore: remove defunct comment about py2 compatibility by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2724

* build(deps): bump typing-extensions from 4.12.2 to 4.13.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2776
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.3.0 to 2.4.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2775

* refactor(bzlmod): stop using 'repo' attr in whl_library by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2779

* fix(ci): use ubuntu-latest for mypy action by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2784
* doc: better document supported platform tiers by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2783
* fix(rules): copy_propagating_kwargs() now also copies target_compatible_with by @dws in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2788

* chore: remove a stray file by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2795
* build(deps): bump sphinx-rtd-theme from 3.0.1 to 3.0.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2802
* build(deps): bump astroid from 3.3.6 to 3.3.9 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2803
* build(deps): bump packaging from 24.2 to 25.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2804
* fix: fixes to prepare for making bootstrap=script the default for Linux by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2760
* fix: escape more invalid repo string characters by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2801
* fix: parsing metadata with inline licenses by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2806
* test(pypi): add a test case for simpleapi html parsing with % by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2811

For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-4-1)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.4.1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "9f9f3b300a9264e4c77999312ce663be5dee9a56e361a1f6fe7ec60e1beef9a3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.1/rules_python-1.4.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "9f9f3b300a9264e4c77999312ce663be5dee9a56e361a1f6fe7ec60e1beef9a3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.4.1/rules_python-1.4.1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

    python_version = "3.13",
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "c21b61d42c5f208cff59647d6a4ad23104c97612e67c117fe58f8c154b5b3821",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.4.0-rc4",
```

## What's Changed
* docs: add steps for creating release candidates by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2687
* fix(toolchain): no chmod on windows when downloading hermetic toolchain by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2693
* fix: correctly find runfiles root for symlinks by @lpulley in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2665
* feat: add riscv64 linux support by @kxxt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2694
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.2.3 to 2.3.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2698
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.2.3 to 2.3.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2699
* build(deps): bump babel from 2.16.0 to 2.17.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2696
* build(deps): bump keyring from 25.4.1 to 25.5.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2355
* build(deps): bump django from 4.2.17 to 4.2.20 in /examples/bzlmod_build_file_generation by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2689
* fix: Correctly resolve macOS SDK paths by @shs96c in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2478
* chore: remove old versions of Python 3.8 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2700
* feat: uv lock rule instead of genrule by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2657
* feat(python.toolchain): support file-based default Python version by @vonschultz in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2588
* fix(pypi): output only necessary target_platforms by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2710
* refactor(pypi): implement PEP508 compliant marker evaluation by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2692
* fix(docs): CHANGELOG "astral" typo by @lpulley in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2715
* build(deps): bump sphinx-reredirects from 0.1.5 to 0.1.6 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2716
* build(deps): bump certifi from 2024.8.30 to 2025.1.31 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2718
* build(deps): bump certifi from 2024.8.30 to 2025.1.31 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2719
* build(deps): bump pygments from 2.18.0 to 2.19.1 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2720
* fix: Fix Python 3.4.x compatibilty with bootstrap (#2709) by @armandomontanez in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2714
* build(deps): bump packaging from 24.1 to 24.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2721
* chore: remove semantics.bzl by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2725
* chore: remove defunct comment about py2 compatibility by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2724
* feat(pypi/parse_requirements): get dists by version when no hash provied by @Yanpei-Wang in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2695
* fix(toolchains): correctly order the toolchains by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2735
* fix: allow warn logging to be disabled via RULES_PYTHON_REPO_DEBUG_VERBOSITY by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2737
* fix: run check on interpreter in isolated mode by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2738
* fix(pypi): correctly fallback to pip for git direct URLs by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2732
* fix: support gazelle generation_mode:update_only by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2708
* fix(pypi): mark the extension reproducible by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2730
* feat: allow populating binary's venv site-packages with symlinks by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2617
* docs: fix a few xrefs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2740
* fix: treat ignore_root_user_error either ignored or warning by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2739
* fix: Ensure temporary .pyc & .pyo files are excluded from the interpreters repository files by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2743
* chore: remove unnecessary DEFAULT_BOOTSTRAP_TEMPLATE global by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2744
* build(deps): bump jinja2 from 3.1.4 to 3.1.6 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2750
* build(deps): bump absl-py from 2.1.0 to 2.2.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2751
* build(deps): bump charset-normalizer from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2752
* build(deps): bump charset-normalizer from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2753
* build(deps): bump jinja2 from 3.1.4 to 3.1.6 in /examples/pip_parse by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2754
* build(deps): bump cryptography from 43.0.3 to 44.0.1 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2756
* feat(toolchains): create toolchains from locally installed python by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2742
* fix: run python version call in isolated mode by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2761
* fix(pypi): fixes to the marker evaluation and utils by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2767
* fix: Prevent absolute path creation in uv lock template by @asa in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2769
* fix: Resolve incorrect platform specific dependency by @ewianda in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2766
* fix(rules): make the srcs trully optional by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2768
* refactor(pypi): translate wheel METADATA parsing to starlark by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2629
* fix: replace string with modern providers in tests by @comius in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2773
* feat(toolchain): Add new make vars for Python interpreter path compliant with `--no_legacy_external_runfiles` by @FrankPortman in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2772
* fix(packaging): Format `METADATA` correctly if given empty `requires_file` by @FrankPortman in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2771
* build(deps): bump typing-extensions from 4.12.2 to 4.13.2 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2776
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.3.0 to 2.4.0 in /tools/publish by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2775
* build(deps): bump urllib3 from 2.3.0 to 2.4.0 in /docs by @dependabot in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2774
* refactor(bzlmod): stop using 'repo' attr in whl_library by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2779
* perf: lazily load gazelle manifest files by @mattem in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2746
* fix(ci): use ubuntu-latest for mypy action by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2784
* doc: better document supported platform tiers by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2783
* fix(rules): copy_propagating_kwargs() now also copies target_compatible_with by @dws in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2788
* release: 1.4.0 release prep by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2789

## What's Changed
* docs: Add horizontal spacers around filenames in custom toolchain guide by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2563
* fix: Avoid creating URLs with empty path segments from index URLs in environment variables by @WillMorrison in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2557
* docs: update gazelle README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2567
* fix: Don't fail in override from a non-root module by @mailto-jonas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2566
* chore: remove internal usage of deprecated py_binary ad py_test by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2569
* fix: Fix encoding of runfiles manifest and repository mapping files. by @phst in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2568
* fix: make coverage work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2574
* doc: point users to our CHANGELOG at the top of the release note by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2582
* fix: Enable location expansion for `sh_py_run_test` by @philsc in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2583
* fix(sphinxdocs): do not crash when tag_class does not have doc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2585
* refactor(uv): move around uv implementation files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2580
* revert: Updated pip and packaging versions to work with free-threading packages (#2514) by @aignas in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2584
* docs: using python_version attribute for specifying python version by @JeroenSchmidt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2589
* fix: make plain zipapp work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2598
* fix: add flag to use runtime venv creation when using bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2590
* docs: Update URL in gazelle example by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2602
* refactor: expose base rule construction via builders to allow customization for testing by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2600
* feat: Remove and redirect py_proto_library to protobuf by @comius in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2604

* refactor: API for deriving customized versions of the base rules by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/pull/2610

name: 1.3.0-rc1
body:
For more detailed setup instructions, see https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

For the user-facing changelog see [here](https://rules-python.readthedocs.io/en/latest/changelog.html#v1-3-0-rc1)

## Using Bzlmod

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_python", version = "1.3.0-rc1")

python = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:python.bzl", "python")
python.toolchain(
    python_version = "3.13",
)

pip = use_extension("@rules_python//python/extensions:pip.bzl", "pip")
pip.parse(
    hub_name = "pypi",
    python_version = "3.13",
    requirements_lock = "//:requirements_lock.txt",
)

use_repo(pip, "pypi")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_python",
    sha256 = "069b14defc462c1382d4d8f00c25eb59dc468e38d6c932471312d466fdf7700b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.3.0-rc1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.3.0-rc1/rules_python-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")

py_repositories()
```

### Gazelle plugin

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_python_gazelle_plugin",
    sha256 = "069b14defc462c1382d4d8f00c25eb59dc468e38d6c932471312d466fdf7700b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_python-1.3.0-rc1/gazelle",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_python/releases/download/1.3.0-rc1/rules_python-1.3.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

# To compile the rules_python gazelle extension from source,
# we must fetch some third-party go dependencies that it uses.

load("@rules_python_gazelle_plugin//:deps.bzl", _py_gazelle_deps = "gazelle_deps")

_py_gazelle_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* docs: Add horizontal spacers around filenames in custom toolchain guide by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2563
* fix: Avoid creating URLs with empty path segments from index URLs in environment variables by @WillMorrison in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2557
* docs: update gazelle README.md by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2567
* fix: Don't fail in override from a non-root module by @mailto-jonas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2566
* chore: remove internal usage of deprecated py_binary ad py_test by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2569
* fix: Fix encoding of runfiles manifest and repository mapping files. by @phst in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2568
* fix: make coverage work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2574
* doc: point users to our CHANGELOG at the top of the release note by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2582
* fix: Enable location expansion for `sh_py_run_test` by @philsc in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2583
* fix(sphinxdocs): do not crash when tag_class does not have doc by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2585
* refactor(uv): move around uv implementation files by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2580
* revert: Updated pip and packaging versions to work with free-threading packages (#2514) by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2584
* docs: using python_version attribute for specifying python version by @JeroenSchmidt in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2589
* fix: make plain zipapp work with bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2598
* fix: add flag to use runtime venv creation when using bootstrap=script by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2590
* docs: Update URL in gazelle example by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2602
* refactor: expose base rule construction via builders to allow customization for testing by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2600
* feat: Remove and redirect py_proto_library to protobuf by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2604
* chore: updates for 1.2.0 release by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2611

* refactor: Add GAZELLE_VERBOSE env and log parser failures by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2420
* refactor(toolchain): use bazel to extract `zstd` archives by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2412
* refactor!(toolchain): remove uname dep in the repository_rule stage by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2406
* fix(pypi): handle multiple versions of the same package when parsing requirements files by @ewianda in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2377
* fix(uv): Fix sha256 for uv binary for aarch64-apple-darwin by @schultetwin in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2422
* feat(musl): add musl toolchain by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2402
* chore: extra code removals before 1.0 by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2421
* feat(pypi):  Add extra_hub_aliases to pip_repository too by @gholms in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2426
* chore!(pip.parse): remove parse_all_requirements_files attribute by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2407
* chore(gazelle): Rename GAZELLE_VERBOSE env var; use idiomatic go; add comments by @dougthor42 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2428
* fix: make sys.executable work with script bootstrap by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2409
* tests: make workspace CI jobs enable workspace mode by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2435
* fix: use com_google_protobuf in WORKSPACE by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2432
* chore: add dougthor42 as one of the gazelle owners by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2427
* ci: rm the lock file testing by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2430
* tests: make some tests compatible with Bazel 9 fix various tests relying on Bazel builtin providers existing by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2433
* refactor(pypi): move config setting processing to the macro by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2424
* chore: rename the dev-only setup files to more clearly self-describe what they are by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2436
* fix: correctly obtain relative path required for the venv created by `--bootstrap_impl=script` by @chowder in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2439
* fix: Propagate common kwargs to sphinx_run by @tpudlik in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2442
* fix: upgrade to bazel_features 1.21.0 for Bazel 8 rc3 support by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2440
* fix(render_pkg_aliases): correctly render when we have target_platforms set by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2447
* deps: upgrade to stardoc 0.7.2 for Bazel 8 support by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2451
* chore: auto compute prelease setting by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2452
* feat(runfiles): add support for spaces and newlines in runfiles paths by @dizzy57 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2456
* fix: upgrade to rules_bazel_integration_test 0.27.0 for bazel 9 compatibility by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2454
* doc: improve alias error msg in pip hubs by @aignas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2458
* fix: Add `libs/python3.lib` to libpython target for SABI builds on Windows by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/1820
* fix: dependency resolver on windows only works when --enable_runfiles and --windows_enable_symlinks is used by @ChewyGumball in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2457
* chore: remove defunct code from py_cc_link_params_info.bzl by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2465
* fix: add missing api distribution target by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2464
* docs: mention calling register_toolchains in custom toolchain docs by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2463
* test: Enable non-ABI3 libs linking test for Windows by @nicholasjng in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2461
* fix: only delete first sys.path entry in the stage-2 bootstrap if PYTHONSAFEPATH is unset or unsupported by @chowder in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2418
* fix(gazelle): empty list by @hunshcn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_python/pull/2099
